page.title: 04Residents Concerns
page.content: The people in the area have many feelings towards the area both from a negative and positive point of view. Although there is a public transport system consisting of both a rail and bus network, a large percentage of residents feel that the bus services are totally inadequate and that if given the option this is the one most important facility they would ask for. There is a great deal of concern that there are not enough facilities for children and teenagers.Within walking distance of Rainford Junction there is only one small play area. At a meeting on the 12th June 1984 the Community Liason Forum stated that "local parents had been motivated towards more provision socially for young people and that 80 young people wish to join a Youth Club"
